Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
ConfusionScript = script:WaitForChild("ConfusionScript")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePart.CanCollide = true BasePart.Locked = true BasePart.Anchored = false
BaseFlail = BasePart:Clone() BaseFlail.Name = "Flail" BaseFlail.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 2) FlailMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") FlailMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh FlailMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=186739053" FlailMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=186516726" FlailMesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) FlailMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) FlailMesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) FlailMesh.Parent = BaseFlail
IceTexture = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=186936495"
Animations = { HoldUp = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("HoldUp"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 6, Duration = 1}, HoldUpLooped = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("HoldUpLooped"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 0.75, Duration = nil}, HoldDown = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("HoldDown"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 6, Duration = 1}, HoldDownLooped = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("HoldDownLooped"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 0.75, Duration = nil}, HoldCompleteDown = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("HoldCompleteDown"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 3, Duration = 1}, Swing = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = 6, Duration = nil}, }
Sounds = { Hit = Handle:WaitForChild("Hit"), Swing = Handle:WaitForChild("Swing"), Spin = Handle:WaitForChild("Spin") }
Damages = { Touched = {Damage = 8}, Hit = {Damage = 15}, Slash = {Damage = 20}, SwingHit = {Damage = 10}, SwingBash = {Damage = 12.5} }
CurrentDamage = Damages.Touched
Clicks = 0 FirstClick = false
ToolEquipped = false MouseDown = false Spinning = false AnimPlaying = false
ReloadTime = 0.25
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player == Player and ToolEquipped and CheckIfAlive() then if Mode == "KeyPress" then local Key = Value.Key local Down = Value.Down if Key == "q" and Flail and Flail.Parent and FlailMotor and FlailMotor.Parent then end elseif Mode == "MouseClick" then if Value.Down then MouseDown = true Activated() else if Spinning and MouseDown then Tool.Enabled = false Sounds.Spin:Stop() Sounds.Swing:Play() Spinning = false local Animation = Animations.Swing FlailMotor.C0 = CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), 0) + Vector3.new(0, 0.0125, -1.05) FlailMotor.C1 = CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), 0) - Vector3.new(0, -0.0125, -1.95) FlailMotor.MaxVelocity = math.huge FlailMotor.DesiredAngle = 0 FlailMotor.CurrentAngle = FlailMotor.DesiredAngle local HoldDown = Animations.HoldCompleteDown local HoldDownAnimation = {Animation = HoldDown.Animation, FadeTime = HoldDown.FadeTime, Weight = HoldDown.Weight, Speed = 10, Duration = 0.5} SetCurrentDamage((HoldDownAnimation.Duration / 2), Damages.SwingBash) InvokeClient("StopAnimation", Animation) InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", HoldDownAnimation) wait(HoldDownAnimation.Duration / 2) FlailMotor.MaxVelocity = -0.1 FlailMotor.DesiredAngle = 2.75 wait(ReloadTime * 2) AnimPlaying = false Tool.Enabled = true end MouseDown = false end end end end)
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ReturnValue = nil pcall(function() ReturnValue = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ReturnValue end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function SetCurrentDamage(Delay, Damage) Spawn(function() CurrentDamage = Damage if not ToolEquipped or not Delay then return end if DelayToolUnequipped then DelayToolUnequipped:disconnect() end local CurrentlyEquipped = true DelayToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end) wait(Delay) if not DelayToolUnequipped.connected then return end if DelayToolUnequipped then DelayToolUnequipped:disconnect() end if not CurrentlyEquipped then return end CurrentDamage = Damages.Touched end) end
function CreateFlail() if not Flail or not Flail.Parent or not FlailMotor or not FlailMotor.Parent then if Flail and Flail.Parent then Flail:Destroy() end for i, v in pairs(Tool:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") and v.Name == "Flail" then v:Destroy() end end Flail = BaseFlail:Clone() Flail.CanCollide = false FlailMotor = Instance.new("Motor6D") FlailMotor.Name = "Motor" FlailMotor.Part0 = Handle FlailMotor.Part1 = Flail FlailMotor.C0 = CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), 0) + Vector3.new(0, 0.0125, -1.05) FlailMotor.C1 = CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), 0) - Vector3.new(0, -0.0125, -1.95) FlailMotor.MaxVelocity = -0.1 FlailMotor.DesiredAngle = 2.75 FlailMotor.CurrentAngle = FlailMotor.DesiredAngle FlailMotor.Parent = Flail Flail.Parent = Tool Flail.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent then return end local character = Hit.Parent if character == Character then return end local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local torso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then Sounds.Hit:Play() UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(CurrentDamage.Damage) if CurrentDamage == Damages.Slash then torso.Velocity = CFrame.new(Handle.Position, torso.Position).lookVector * 100 elseif CurrentDamage == Damages.SwingHit then torso.Velocity = CFrame.new(Handle.Position, torso.Position).lookVector * 50 elseif CurrentDamage == Damages.SwingBash then local ConfusionScriptClone = humanoid:FindFirstChild("ConfusionScript") if not ConfusionScriptClone then ConfusionScriptClone = ConfusionScript:Clone() local DurationValue = Instance.new("NumberValue") DurationValue.Name = "Duration" DurationValue.Value = 5 DurationValue.Parent = ConfusionScriptClone ConfusionScriptClone.Disabled = false ConfusionScriptClone.Parent = humanoid end end end end) end end
function Activated() if not ToolEquipped or not CheckIfAlive() and Flail and Flail.Parent and FlailMotor and FlailMotor.Parent then return end Clicks = (Clicks + 1) if not Tool.Enabled then return end if not FirstClick then FirstClick = true local CurrentlyEquipped = true ToolUnequipped = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() CurrentlyEquipped = false end) wait(0.15) Tool.Enabled = false if ToolUnequipped then ToolUnequipped:disconnect() end if not CurrentlyEquipped or AnimPlaying then return end if Clicks > 1 then AnimPlaying = true local HoldUp = Animations.HoldUp local HoldUpAnimation = {Animation = HoldUp.Animation, FadeTime = HoldUp.FadeTime, Weight = HoldUp.Weight, Speed = 15, Duration = 0.5} local HoldDown = Animations.HoldCompleteDown local HoldDownAnimation = {Animation = HoldDown.Animation, FadeTime = HoldDown.FadeTime, Weight = HoldDown.Weight, Speed = 10, Duration = 0.5} SetCurrentDamage((HoldUpAnimation.Duration + (HoldDownAnimation.Duration / 2)), Damages.Slash) FlailMotor.DesiredAngle = 0 InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", HoldUpAnimation) wait(HoldUpAnimation.Duration) Sounds.Swing:Play() InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", HoldDownAnimation) wait(HoldDownAnimation.Duration / 2) FlailMotor.DesiredAngle = 2.75 wait(HoldDownAnimation.Duration / 2) AnimPlaying = false else if MouseDown and not Spinning then AnimPlaying = true Spinning = true Sounds.Spin:Play() local Animation = Animations.Swing InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animation) FlailMotor.C0 = CFrame.Angles(0,0,0) + Vector3.new(0, 0.0125, -1.05) FlailMotor.C1 = CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0) - Vector3.new(0, -0.0125, -1.95) FlailMotor.MaxVelocity = -0.15 FlailMotor.DesiredAngle = 999999999 SetCurrentDamage(nil, Damages.SwingHit) else AnimPlayng = true local HoldUp = Animations.HoldUp local HoldUpAnimation = {Animation = HoldUp.Animation, FadeTime = HoldUp.FadeTime, Weight = HoldUp.Weight, Speed = 15, Duration = 0.5} local HoldDown = Animations.HoldDown local HoldDownAnimation = {Animation = HoldDown.Animation, FadeTime = HoldDown.FadeTime, Weight = HoldDown.Weight, Speed = 15, Duration = 0.5} SetCurrentDamage((HoldUpAnimation.Duration + (HoldDownAnimation.Duration / 2)), Damages.Hit) InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", HoldUpAnimation) FlailMotor.DesiredAngle = (0 - (math.random(0, 50) * 0.01)) wait(HoldUpAnimation.Duration) Sounds.Swing:Play() InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", HoldDownAnimation) FlailMotor.DesiredAngle = (2.75 + (math.random(0, 75) * 0.01)) wait(HoldDownAnimation.Duration / 2) FlailMotor.DesiredAngle = 2.75 AnimPlaying = false end end if not MouseDown then wait(ReloadTime) end FirstClick = false Clicks = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) end
function Equipped(Mouse) ToolEquipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end for i, v in pairs(Animations) do InvokeClient("Preload", v.Animation.AnimationId) end for i, v in pairs(Sounds) do InvokeClient("Preload", v.SoundId) end Spawn(function() CreateFlail() end) end
function Unequipped() ToolEquipped = false MouseDown = false Spinning = false AnimPlaying = false Clicks = 0 FirstClick = false SetCurrentDamage(nil, Damages.Touched) Spawn(function() CreateFlail() end) for i, v in pairs({ToolUnequipped, DelayToolUnequipped}) do if v then v:disconnect() end end for i, v in pairs(Animations) do InvokeClient("StopAnimation", v) end for i, v in pairs(Sounds) do v:Stop() InvokeClient("StopSound", v) end end
for i, v in pairs(Tool:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") and v ~= Handle then v:Destroy() end end
CreateFlail() Tool.Enabled = true
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Humanoid = script.Parent Character = Humanoid.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Head = Character:WaitForChild("Head")
Face = Head:FindFirstChild("face")
Texture = 186936495 FaceId = 186936651
FreezeColor = BrickColor.new("Pastel Blue")
Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character)
Duration = script:WaitForChild("Duration").Value
function DestroyScript() Debris:AddItem(script, 1) end
function GetAllObjects(Parent) local Objects = {} local function GetObjects(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v.Parent:IsA("Tool") then return end table.insert(Objects, v) GetObjects(v) end end GetObjects(Parent) return Objects end
function BeginFreeze() if Player then PlayerGui = Player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if PlayerGui then FreezeGui = PlayerGui:FindFirstChild("FreezeGui") if not FreezeGui then FreezeGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") FreezeGui.Name = "FreezeGui" ImageLabel = Instance.new("ImageLabel") ImageLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1 ImageLabel.BorderSizePixel = 0 ImageLabel.ImageTransparency = 0.35 ImageLabel.Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=186936495" ImageLabel.Position = UDim2.new(-0.05, 0, -0.05, 0) ImageLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1.1, 0, 1.1, 0) ImageLabel.Parent = FreezeGui FreezeGui.Parent = PlayerGui end end end Objects = GetAllObjects(Character) for i, v in pairs(Objects) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then Objects[i] = {Object = v, Parent = v.Parent, BrickColor = v.BrickColor} v.BrickColor = FreezeColor elseif v:IsA("DataModelMesh") then Objects[i] = {Object = v, NewObject = v:Clone(), Parent = v.Parent, VertexColor = v.VertexColor} local Color = FreezeColor.Color local r, g, b = Color.r, Color.g, Color.b v.VertexColor = Vector3.new(r, g, b) v.TextureId = ("http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. Texture) if v:IsA("FileMesh") then v.TextureId = ("http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. Texture) end elseif v:IsA("Clothing") or v:IsA("ShirtGraphic") or v:IsA("Decal") and v.Name ~= "face" then Objects[i] = {Object = v, NewObject = v:Clone(), Parent = v.Parent} v:Destroy() elseif v:IsA("CharacterMesh") then Objects[i] = {Object = v, NewObject = v:Clone(), Parent = v.Parent} v.BaseTextureId = Texture v.OverlayTextureId = Texture end end OriginalFace = Face.Texture Face.Texture = ("http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. FaceId)
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = -8
DisableJump = Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Jump" then Humanoid.Jump = false end end) end
function EndFreeze() if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end if DisableJump then DisableJump:disconnect() end if Face and Face.Parent then Face.Texture = OriginalFace end if Objects and #Objects > 0 then for i, v in pairs(Objects) do if type(v) == "table" and v.Object then if v.Object:IsA("BasePart") then v.Object.BrickColor = v.BrickColor elseif v.Object:IsA("DataModelMesh") or v.Object:IsA("Clothing") or v.Object:IsA("ShirtGraphic") or v.Object:IsA("Decal") or v.Object:IsA("CharacterMesh") then if v.Object.Parent then v.Object:Destroy() end if v.Object:IsA("CharacterMesh") then end v.NewObject.Parent = v.Parent end end end end if FreezeGui and FreezeGui.Parent then FreezeGui:Destroy() end DestroyScript() end
BeginFreeze()
wait(Duration)
EndFreeze()

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if Mode == "PlayAnimation" and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = Value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(Value.FadeTime, Value.Weight, Value.Speed) elseif Mode == "StopAnimation" and Value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end elseif Mode == "Preload" and Value then ContentProvider:Preload(Value) elseif Mode == "PlaySound" and Value then Value:Play() elseif Mode == "StopSound" and Value then Value:Stop() elseif Mode == "MousePosition" then return PlayerMouse.Hit.p elseif Mode == "DisableJump" then DisableJump(Value) elseif Mode == "GetCamera" and Value then local PropertyValue = nil if Value.Property then pcall(function() PropertyValue = Camera[Value.Property] end) end return PropertyValue elseif Mode == "SetCamera" and Value then if Value.Property and Value.Value then pcall(function() Camera[Value.Property] = Value.Value end) end end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) local ServerReturn = nil pcall(function() ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) end) return ServerReturn end
function DisableJump(Boolean) if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end if Boolean then PreventJump = Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Jump" then Humanoid.Jump = false end end) end end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Player:GetMouse() Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = true}) end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = false}) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end if PreventJump then PreventJump:disconnect() end Animations = {} end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
